Text.CultureInvariantString: This perk will unlock at level {0} for {1}.

A Hex rooting its power in despair. Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention. Survivors receive a {0}% regression penalty when missing any Skill Check.
Each time a Survivor is hooked, Huntress Lullaby grows in power:
  • 1 to 4 Tokens: Time between the Skill Check warning sound and the Skill Check becomes shorter.
  • 5 Tokens: No Skill Check warning.

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.
